data: Ek samay ki baat hai, ek chataak fox tha. Vah bahut hi chalak aur buddhimaan tha. Ek din, vah jungle mein ghoomta hua ek aam ke ped ke neeche aaya. Usne dekha ki ped par bahut hi meetha aam lagte hain. Fox ne socha, 'Yeh aam kaise haasil karoon?' Vah kuch der sochta raha, phir usne ek yojna banayi. Usne khud ko bahut rotaya aur fir us aam ke ped ke paas aakar gir pada. Ek kisaan us ped ke paas se guzra, usne dekha ki fox mar gaya hai. Kisaan ne socha, 'Yeh fox shayad bimaar tha, isliye yeh mar gaya.' Kisaan ne us fox ko uthaya aur apne gaon le jaane ke liye ek jholi mein daal diya. Fox ne socha, 'Ab main aam haasil kar sakta hoon.' Jholi mein se fox ne aam tod diya aur khaane laga. Kisaan ne dekha ki jholi mein se aam gir rahe hain. Kisaan ne socha, 'Maine to fox ko mara hua samjha tha, par ye toh abhi bhi zinda hai!' Fox ne kisaan ko dekha aur muskuraaya. Phir vah aam khaate hue bhag gaya. Kisaan ne socha, 'Yeh fox bahut hi chalak hai, main isse nahin pakad sakta.'
